msg: Adding ManagedRepositoryContent.toFile( ArchivaArtifact ) and ManagedRepositoryContent.toPath( ArchivaArtifact )

author: joakime
msg: Moved Keys out of archiva-dependency-graph into archiva-model to aide in logging cleanup elsewhere.

author: joakime
msg: Fixed unit tests for RepositoryPurge as they were non-repeatable in an IDE environment.
Corrected the assumption that a Managed Repository is the same as a Local Repository. (re: maven-metadata-local.xml)
Streamlined asserts to be more clear .assertExists() .assertDeleted() when reading code and when error message is created.
Removed jdom direct usage in unit tests in favor of XMLUnit.
